pr_title: [FLINK-15512][statebackend] Refactor the mechanism to calculate the cache capacity shared among RocksDB instance(s)

timeline.message:
[FLINK-15512][statebackend] Refactor the mechanism to calculate the cache capacity shared among RocksDB instance(s)

Due to the implemenation of write buffer manager of RocksDB and the issue cannot create stric capacity limit cache, we need to refactor the mechanism to calculate the cache capacity shared among RocksDB instance(s).

timeline.bodyText: Suggest to add a TODO comment here, mentioning that we will change the strictCapacityLimit flag to true after rocksdb#6247 is resolved.
timeline.author: carp84

timeline.bodyText: Ditto, please revert this change if no rational reason.
timeline.author: carp84

timeline.bodyText: The WriteBufferManager size should also be calculated with the deduced formula: 2 * total_memory_size * write_buffer_ratio / 3
timeline.author: carp84

timeline.bodyText: The design of this test seems to be tightly coupled with the implementation, while it's true that we cannot get the actual cache size through RocksDB's JNI (not exposed so reflection couldn't get it, either)
timeline.author: carp84

timeline.bodyText: I suggest to either remove this test, or also add a verification of write buffer manager size.
